'''1.21.01.0''' is the fourth and final Preview version of [[Minecraft Education 1.21.03]], released on June 18, 2024.<ref name=changelog>[https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/23323615654164-What-s-New-in-the-Cloud-Preview-v1-21-01 What's New in the Cloud Preview (v1.21.01)]</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.20.80|Bedrock Edition 1.21.0}}
* Added features from [[Armored Paws]] and [[Tricky Trials]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
; [[Balloon]]s and [[Glowstick]]s
* Chemistry items like balloons and glowsticks are now available in the creative inventory.

=== General ===
* The "Manage Account" button has been moved to the bottom right of the home screen so all your profile management is in one place.

== Fixes ==
* Spectator Mode has been accidently included as an available game mode.
* Some functions while coding in Python Notebooks will result in a Syntax Error: Unexpected 0 error message.
* Improvements to performance and product stability</onlyinclude>
